document_data.caption: The shrine's soup kitchen.
document_data.name: Shrine of the Suffering
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Shrine of the Suffering''' was a shrine of [[Ilmater]] in [[Baldur's Gate]] established before [[1358 DR]].<ref><ref>

In the 15th century, the Shrine provided free meals and a few coppers to the poor and destitute.
